snippet.title: R?MJ: The Mystery Hospital PS1 intro
snippet.description: This game is insane. You can pretty much guess what the plot is from the awful engrish here. It follows a group of characters trying to escape from a massive hospital. Thats pretty much all i know. It's played in a similar way to Night Head and has a really weird, quirky style

Thats pretty much all i know. It's played in a similar way to Night Head and has a really weird, quirky style
